---
title: "DLM Dashboard Usage"
author: "Jonathan Hickford"
date: "Monday, March 02, 2015"
output: html_document
---

Load data

```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
usage.wide = read.csv(file.path("..", "usage-reports-new-account","usage-new-account.rb_output.csv"))
usage.long = melt(usage.wide, id.vars=c("Period.ending.on"))
usage.long$"Period.ending.on" <- as.Date(usage.wide$"Period.ending.on","%Y-%m-%d")
```

Plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
qplot(Period.ending.on, value, data = usage.long, color = variable, group = variable, geom = c("point", "line"))
```
